properties.Name: VendorSalesTerm

Columns.Name: VendorId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Vendor.

Columns.Name: SalesTermId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Sales Term.

Columns.Name: MinimumTransactionAmount
Columns.Description: The minimum transaction amount in the associated transaction range for which the associated Sales Term(s) are offered or extended.

Columns.Name: MaximumTransactionAmount
Columns.Description: The maximum transaction amount in the associated transaction range for which the associated Sales Term(s) are offered or extended.

Columns.Name: PeriodStartDate
Columns.Description: The period start date for which the associated data is effective.

Columns.Name: PeriodEndDate
Columns.Description: The period end date for which the associated data is effective.

Columns.Name: VendorSalesTermNote
Columns.Description: A note, comment or additional information regarding the Vendor sales term.
